directions_instructions: Remove any damaged cabbage leaves from head. Set aside 6 larger leaves to use for serving. Dice remaining cabbage head and set aside.

Brown ground pork in a large skillet over medium-high heat, about 5 minutes. Add diced cabbage, onion, mushrooms, garlic, and ginger to the skillet and reduce heat to medium. Continue to cook and stir until onion has softened, about 5 minutes.
Season with soy sauce, vinegar, and sesame oil. Stir to combine and allow flavors to meld, 1 to 2 minutes.
Set out cabbage leaves and fill with pork mixture. Garnish with green onions.
nutrition_summary: 397 calories; protein 31g; carbohydrates 14.2g; fat 24.3g; cholesterol 98.1mg; sodium 708.8mg. Full Nutrition
